text:
M. S. NOVIK, Director
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
WNYC
And
Stations
WASJ
WKDX
WBCD
W2XRG
W2XVP
January 10th, 1939
Mr. Frank Schooly
University of Illinois
Radio Station V/ I L L
Urbana, Ill.
My dear Mr. Schooly;
S. Howard Evans has assured me that it is quite
alright to write you for information about the general character
of your programs.
I am especially interested in getting a fairly
accurate record of the extent to which you have picked up programs
from other stations, by any means other than direct wires, or
allowed your programs to be picked up.
I have enclosed a copy of our recent Masterwork
Bulletin and put your name on the mailing list so that you will
receive all of our future printed matter. I would appreciate
it greatly if you would send on to me any printed material that
you may have.
S
MSN sc
NEW YORK
WORLD S FAIR 1939
'New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
